title: Zarrio by Eduardo García
author: Eduardo García
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Zarrio by Eduardo García
text:
Skip to content
Issue 160 – January 2020Cover ArtZarrioEduardo García is a Spanish designer/illustrator who works primarily in the videogame industry. He has also illustrated various board games and provided concept art for some small computer indie games. He is currently working on "The Settlers" for Blue Byte.
